txt.en: Orc altars can be found in northern Agarnaith.\n\nYou should try <rgb=#FF00FF>lying down</rgb> on an altar.
Viznak can be called with the goblin-caller.\n\nYou should talk to Viznak.
This looks like the altar Viznak was tied upon
Viznak's first idea for getting into Seregost is to 'request an invitation.' Dangerous, to say the least!
'First idea! Infected Orcs strap you to altars, bat-people come pick you up, take you inside! Happened to me almost! You try! Find an altar and lie on it. What could go wrong?'
'That didn't work. Guess you scared them off! We try new plan.'
Orc altars can be found in northern Agarnaith.\n\nYou should find an Orc altar.
